LanguageData.MGHU.DumpAllDesc: Dumps all cargo, may dump cargo further away from the track if there is no free space next to the track
LanguageData.MGHU.DumpFreeDesc: Will dump cargo in nearby free spaces, if there are not enough free spaces, cargo will remain in the cart
LanguageData.MGHU.UseStorageDesc: Will only dump cargo in valid storage, if there are no free storage, cargo will remain in the cart
LanguageData.MGHU.AutoLaunchDesc: When the last item is added to the cart, the loading pawn will automatically launch the cart
LanguageData.MGHU.AutoSwitchDesc: Toggle the direction of the rail switch automatically after a minecart passes over it
LanguageData.MGHU.DropAllRangeTT: The radius from the drop-cell to drop items when the dump all-option is used
LanguageData.MGHU.FreeSpaceRangeTT: The radius from the drop-cell to drop items when the free space-option is used
LanguageData.MGHU.StorageRangeTT: The radius from the drop-cell to look for valid storages when the storage only-option is used
